text: Nyagarama (1946 â€“ 18 December 2020), formally known as John Obiero Nyagarama, was a Kenyan politician. He was the first Governor of Nyamira County from 2013 until his death. He was a member of the Orange Democratic Movement. Nyagarama was born in Nyamira County, Kenya. Nyagarama was diagnosed with COVID-19 on 15 December 2020 and was hospitalized in Nairobi, Kenya. He died three days later from respiratory failure caused by the infection, aged 74. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Kenyan politicians
title: John Obiero Nyagarama
